pages.text: $(li)The Tallow is an item that you can use to craft $(l:patchouli:decoration/buzzier_bees/candle)Candles$(/l) and $(l)Tallow Blocks$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pigs$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
